title: 3 and Out - NFL Coaching Matters More; Full Week 13 Preview; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - NFL Coaching Matters More; Full Week 13 Preview; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, Middlekauff explains why NFL coaching is so much more important in the NFL than the other major sports, and previews the full slate of Week 13 weekend games. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
